Are you ready to rise to the challenge and lead the future of education? The Aspiring Leaders Program is your chance to develop powerful leadership skills, gain hands-on experience, and make an impact in our growing network. With 24 new schools set to open, weâ€™re looking for visionary leaders to step up and shape the future. Plus, youâ€™ll earn a $5,000 sign-on bonus when hired into a leadership role! ğŸ’¡
The Aspiring Leaders Program is open to all current educators and staff members passionate about advancing their careers with Concept Schools and influencing education on a larger scale. ğŸ“
Program Timeline: January 2025 - January 2026
Donâ€™t Miss Out! â­ The interest window closes on November 8th, so click the link below to express your interest and embark on your next big career move! ğŸ‘
